data.text: @lapublichealth Was Feb 27 numbers rolled in to the 28th?

@steven91284 @natedj12 @lapublichealth I would have worn a mask had we been educated about other diseases before. If I knew that me carrying any disease,  at any point,  would potentially wear a mask, i would wear a mask forever. We wear underwear every day. What's the difference?
@Clippersfann203 @Hippydodgerfan @Geis_cn @lapublichealth @CountyofLA What am I debunking? Are you ok? You seem really on edge. Breathe...in...and out...in...out...there. Calm...
@Clippersfann203 @Hippydodgerfan @Geis_cn @lapublichealth @CountyofLA "recovery" doesn't mean what you think it does.
@IceMaidenA2 @Hippydodgerfan @Geis_cn @lapublichealth @CountyofLA You can't debunk anything I said dude without rude liberal smart-ass remarks like the typical liberal
@IceMaidenA2 @Hippydodgerfan @Geis_cn @lapublichealth @CountyofLA The recovery rate is 99.8 % without vaccines from covid and all these overhyped variants pandemic over not scary at all

@JayLouis @steven91284 @lapublichealth Also, did I say I was suffering worse then the Ukrainians? Would love to have you show me where I said that. Maybe you should think a little before typing such nonsense in the future.

@JayLouis @steven91284 @lapublichealth First of all, whoever said I was a conservative? That's a rash assumption. Do you have ANY idea how many liberals there are out there that have been highly against all these absurd restrictions from day one but are to afraid to speak out?

@Clippersfann203 @Hippydodgerfan @Geis_cn @lapublichealth @CountyofLA You can dig in all you want, but this is reality. I know it's scary and you don't want to accept it. It is scary for those of us who lived it.
